lines.text: Once upon a time, when knighthood was in flower, there lived a poor old nobleman and his beautiful daughter. In fact, they were so poor that he was down to his last tea bag.

[singing]
# Oh, I'm from the Bureau of Internal Revenue. / Your taxes are due; they're long past due. / According to the government, you owe a lot of dough. / And if you don't pay it, out you go. #

[singing]
# All hail to the hero! All to the hero! / All hail to the hero... #
